directions: In a saucepan over medium-high heat, combine the soup and the 1 cup broth, adding more broth if you prefer a thinner soup. Bring to a simmer and cook, stirring occasionally, until the soup is heated through. Ladle into bowls and serve immediately. Serves 4 to 6.
ingredients: 1 jar (2 lb. 3 oz.) Red Chief lentil and melted leek soup

1 cup low-sodium vegetable or chicken broth, plus more
  as needed
title: Red Chief Lentil and Melted Leek Soup
